Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the tiny, inset $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:Gempieces:material) melee gems set into the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material){? | $(this.trait:pendant:material) | $(this.trait:pendant:type) pendant }$(this.trait:brief)

Each link of finely wrought chain has been sporadically inset with the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems, lending the {? | $(this.trait:pendant:material) | $(this.trait:pendant:type) pendant }$(this.trait:brief)an overall dazzling appearance.

Each link of finely wrought chain has been sporadically inset with the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material) melee gems, lending the {? | $(this.trait:pendant:material) | $(this.trait:pendant:type) pendant }$(this.trait:brief)an overall dazzling appearance.

A loose-hanging piece of jewelry typically hung via a small loop at its top, from a necklace and various other types of chain jewelries. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:type) | This $(this.trait:pendant:material) pendant has been meticulously shaped into a detailed $(this.trait:pendant:type). | Classically contoured and tasteful, this pendant is bordered with a frame of close-set milgrain edging.} {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material) | The $(this.trait:pendant:color) $(this.trait:pendant:material) has been centrally set with a $(this.trait:pendant:gem:shape) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material), within the contours of the $(this.trait:pendant:type) pedant's frame.} The pendant is created in such a way to hang from a matching curled loop of $(this.trait:pendant:material) at its top. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) | Tiny, inset $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) melee gems encrust the contoured edges of this pendant, gradually dissipating in number toward the center to lend the piece an overall dazzling appearance.}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving) | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving).}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:etching) | The back of the pendant itself has been etched with $(this.trait:pendant:etching)}

A loose-hanging piece of jewelry typically hung via a small loop at its top, from a necklace and various other types of chain jewelries. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:type) | This $(this.trait:pendant:material) pendant has been meticulously shaped into a detailed $(this.trait:pendant:type). | Classically contoured and tasteful, this pendant is bordered with a frame of close-set milgrain edging.} {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material) | The $(this.trait:pendant:color) $(this.trait:pendant:material) has been centrally set with a $(this.trait:pendant:gem:shape) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material), within the contours of the $(this.trait:pendant:type) pedant's frame.} The pendant is created in such a way to hang from a matching curled loop of $(this.trait:pendant:material) at its top. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) | Tiny, inset $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) melee gems encrust the contoured edges of this pendant, gradually dissipating in number toward the center to lend the piece an overall dazzling appearance.}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving) | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving).}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:etching) | The back of the pendant itself has been etched with $(this.trait:pendant:etching)}

Core:Properties.Core:Property: ([ "description":(\{ "You shape your necklace into NEW_OBJECT", "shapes a necklace into NEW_OBJECT" \}), "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:shaping-necklace" \}), (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:shaping-necklace" \}) \}), "input-list-actor":(\{ "alteration:knowledge:shaping-necklace" \}), "newobject-properties":(\{ (\{ "trait:material", "trait:material" \}), (\{ "trait:quality", "trait:quality" \}), (\{ "trait:color", "trait:color" \}) \}), "stopvalue":(\{ "trait:type", nil \}) ])
"A draping chain worn around the neck. It secures by means of a basic clasp."

X[M] Set(\$this, "details:pendant:sname:" +\$this."trait:pendant:material"+ ":local", 1); Set(\$this, "details:pendant:sname:pendant:local", 1); return Call(\$\{Ironclaw:Lib:Crafting:Lib\}, "replaceadj", \$object: this, \$detail: "pendant"); return TRUE;
